{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.12902v1", "title": "The Rise of Bluesky", "summary": "This study investigates the rapid growth and evolving network structure of
Bluesky from August 2023 to February 2025. Through multiple waves of user
migrations, the platform has reached a stable, persistently active user base.
The growth process has given rise to a dense follower network with clustering
and hub features that favor viral information diffusion. These developments
highlight engagement and structural similarities between Bluesky and
established platforms.", "main_category": "cs.SI", "categories": "cs.SI,cs.CY", "published": "2025-04-17T12:46:44Z"}
